form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY IN THE UNITED STATES, R0068

full_text: UNI ED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE READSCHEENED by NARA 2/A0/2023LLY. Form approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FEE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED. Budget Bureau No. 43 R0068 EIVED F6E STAMP APPLICATION TO EXTEND $ 10 20 FEE PATD No. POO 72 TIME OF TEMPORARY STAY N SERVICE PORTI 368-1 Immigration and Naturalization Service I HEREBY APPLY TO EXTEND MY TEMPORARY STAY IN Portland, Oregon M & F THE UNITED STATES '72 JUN. 22 Date 6-22-72 Verified by LNB, 1. FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST NAME MIDDLEJNAME (FILE NUMBER 7. DATE TO WHICH EXTENSION IS REQUESTED NGUYEN NHAT THT A19790690 January 1973 2. OTHER NAMES (Include all past and present names; married woman must give her maiden name) 8. REASON FOR COMING TO THE UNITED STATES Tran Dinh Dan Visit children 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 2173 16th Ave. W. Eugene, Oregon 97402 4. DATE OF BIRTH (Mo. - Day - Yr.) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CITIZENSHIP 9. REASON FOR REQUESTING EXTENSION 1906 Vietnam Vietnam Visit daughter and son-in- 5. NONIMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION DATE ON WHICH AUTHORIZED STAY EXPIRES law. B/2 July 17, 1972 SLB CHECKED its 6. DATE AND PORT OF LAST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF 10. DATE OF INTENDED DEPARTURE FROM U.S. LAST ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Date) Honolulu, Hawaii PA 842 January 1973 (By) FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY 11. PASSPORT NUMBER PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) DATE U. S. APPROVED INS. 020124/69 Vietnam OF EXTENSION GRANTED TO (Date) PASSPORT EXPIRES ON (Date) ACTION Jan. 17,1973 JUN 26 1972 December 1973 DD AM AM NOT IN POSSESSION OF A OR 12. EXTENSION DENIED V.D. TO (Date) OFFICE Wm L Pattillo HS IRANSPORTATION TICKET FOR MY DEPARTURE OIC 13. Number, Street, City, Province (State) and Country of Permane PORTEANS, OREGON 14. MY USUAL OCCUPATION IS: 15. SOCIAL SECURITY No. (If none, state "none") 177/2 Le van Duyet Saigon, Vietnam Housewife None 16. AM AM NOT married. If you wish to apply for extension for your spouse and children, give the following: (See Instruction #1) NAMES OF SPOUSE AND CHILDREN DATE OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF BIRTH PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) AND EXPIRES ON (Date) For Statistics on Adjudications Received Tr. In Rel'd . Tr. Out Completed JUN 26.1972 NOTE: If spouse and children for whom you are seeking extension do not reside WRO you, give their complete OTF attention this application. 17. (Insert "Have" or "Have Not") HAVE NOT 1972 I BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES. IF YOU HAVE BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES, COMPLETE THE REST OF THE BLOCK. NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OR BUSINESS KIND OF EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS INCOME PER WEEK DATES SUCH EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS BEGAN AND ENDED 18. IF YOU ARE A TEMPORARY VISITOR FOR PLEASURE (B-2), COMPLETE THIS BLOCK. I HAVE $1000 DOLLARS IN THE UNITED STATES. I RECEIVE DOLLARS EACH FROM: (Day, Week, Month) (Name and Address) 19. I AM VISITING THE FOLLOWING PERSONS IN THE UNITED STATES NAME RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS Mr. & Mrs. James McGeever Daughter & 2173 16th Ave. W. Son-in-law Eugene, Oregon 97402 20. I ATTACH WRITTEN STATEMENT FROM DATED June 17, 1972 IN SUPPORT OF THIS APPLICATION. I BELIEVE SUCH STATEMENT TO BE TRUE AND I MAKE IT PART OF THIS APPLICATION: (See Instruction 6.) I CERTIFY THAT THE ABOVE IS TRUE AND CORRECT SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DATE June 17, 1972 DECLARE THAT THIS DOCUMENT WAS PREPARED BY ME AT THE REQUEST OF THE APPLICANT AND IS BASED ON ALL INFORMATION ADDRESS LABEL FOR NOTICE OF ACTION ON APPLICATION OF WHICH I HAVE ANY KNOWLEDGE. TYPE OR PRINT (VERY FIRMLY AND CLEARLY) YOUR NAME, MAILING ADDRESS, AND IF APPROPRIATE "In Care Of" IN THE SIGNATURE SPACES BELOW. YOUR NAME Mrs. Nguyen Thi Nhat Dreekeam Mcogever DATE STREET ADDRESS 2173 16th Ave. W. June 17, 1972 ZIP ADDRESS CITY AND STATE Eugene, Oregon 97402 2173 16th Ave. W. ATTACH YOUR FORM 1.94 OR SW 434 Eugene, Oregon 97402 FORM 1-539 (REV. 11-1-70)
